mapper.select: SELECT ESTI_ID, T1.FCST_PAL_ID, T1.ESTI_WRT_DATE, T1.DOC_NO, T1.RCV_CMPY_NM, T1.RCV_CHRR_NM, T1.TRSMT_CHRR_NM,T1.TRSMT_TEL_NO, T1.TRSMT_EML_ADRS, T1.BSNS_NM, T1.SPLY_CMPY_NM, T1.SPLY_CMPY_BSNN_NO, T1.SPLY_CMPY_RPRN_NM, T1.SPLY_CMPY_ADRS, T1.SPLY_CMPY_TEL_NO, T1.SPLY_CMPY_FAX_NO, T1.VAT_CVRD_DST_CD, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('VAT_CVRD_DST_CD',T1.VAT_CVRD_DST_CD) AS VAT_CVRD_DST_CD_NM, T1.QLTY_GARNT_SVC_CONT, T1.ETC_MTR, T1.ESTIS_STAT_CD, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('ESTIS_STAT_CD',T1.ESTIS_STAT_CD) AS ESTIS_STAT_CD_NM, T1.ISU_DT, T1.REG_EMP_ID, IBIZ_EMP_NM(T1.REG_EMP_ID) AS REG_EMP_NM, T1.REG_DT, T1.CHG_EMP_ID, IBIZ_EMP_NM(T1.CHG_EMP_ID) AS CHG_EMP_NM, T1.CHG_DT, T2.SLS_EMP_ID, T2.SLS_DEPT_ID FROM BEST100T T1 INNER JOIN BEST000T T2 ON T1.FCST_PAL_ID = T2.FCST_PAL_ID WHERE ESTI_ID = #{estiId}

SELECT B.HGRK_COM_CD AS PROD_DST_CD, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('PROD_DST_CD',B.HGRK_COM_CD) AS PROD_DST_CD_NM, A.ESTI_ID, A.PROD_TYPE_CD, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('PROD_TYPE_CD',A.PROD_TYPE_CD) AS PROD_TYPE_CD_NM, A.SEQ, A.SVC_JOB_NM, A.SPLY_CMPY_NM, A.PRODP_NM, A.PROD_NM, A.UPC_UNIT_NM, A.QNT, A.BSC_UPC_AMT, A.LPC_AMT, A.SPLY_UPC_AMT, A.SPLY_AMT, A.RMRK_CONT FROM BEST110T A JOIN ( SELECT COM_CD, HGRK_COM_CD, SORT_SEQC FROM ACOM010T WHERE COM_GRP_CD = ( SELECT COM_GRP_CD FROM ACOM020T WHERE CLMN_NM = 'PROD_TYPE_CD' ) ) B ON A.PROD_TYPE_CD = B.COM_CD WHERE ESTI_ID = #{estiId} ORDER BY B.SORT_SEQC, A.SEQ

SELECT T0.CUST_ID AS SPLY_CMPY_ID, T0.RPRN_NM AS SPLY_CMPY_RPRN_NM, T0.CSTID_NO AS SPLY_CMPY_BSNN_NO, T0.CUST_NM AS SPLY_CMPY_NM , T3.TEL_NO AS SPLY_CMPY_TEL_NO, T4.TEL_NO AS SPLY_CMPY_FAX_NO, ('('||T5.ZPCD||')'||T5.ZIP_ADRS || T5.DTL_ADRS ) AS SPLY_CMPY_ADRS FROM CMST000T T0 LEFT JOIN CMST001T T1 ON T1.TGT_CUST_ID = T0.CUST_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT TEL_NO,CUST_ID FROM CMST031T T3 WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN T3.AVL_START_DATE AND T3.AVL_END_DATE AND CNPL_DST_CD = 'D' ) T3 ON T0.CUST_ID = T3.CUST_ID --전화번호 LEFT JOIN (SELECT TEL_NO,CUST_ID FROM CMST031T T4 WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN T4.AVL_START_DATE AND T4.AVL_END_DATE AND CNPL_DST_CD = 'C' ) T4 ON T0.CUST_ID = T4.CUST_ID --팩스번호 LEFT JOIN (SELECT ZPCD, ZIP_ADRS, DTL_ADRS, CUST_ID FROM CMST032T T5 WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN T5.AVL_START_DATE AND T5.AVL_END_DATE AND T5.ADRS_DST_CD = 'A' ) T5 ON T0.CUST_ID = T5.CUST_ID --주소 LEFT JOIN SSYS250T S4 ON USER_ID = #{slsEmpId} WHERE T1.CRIT_CUST_ID = S4.CUST_ID AND CUST_REL_TYPE_CD = 'A1'

SELECT CUST_NM, OFPS_NM, BLTO_DEPT_NM AS SLS_DEPT_NM, TEL_NO AS TRSMT_TEL_NO, EML_ADRS AS TRSMT_EML_ADRS FROM ( SELECT T1.CUST_NM, T1.OFPS_NM, T1.BLTO_DEPT_NM, T2.TEL_NO, T3.EML_ADRS FROM CMST000T T1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT ROWNUM, CUST_ID, TEL_NO FROM CMST031T WHERE CNPL_DST_CD = 'B' AND (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmdd') BETWEEN AVL_START_DATE AND AVL_END_DATE) )T2 ON T1.CUST_ID = T2.CUST_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT CUST_ID, EML_ADRS FROM CMST031T WHERE CNPL_DST_CD = 'E' AND (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmdd') BETWEEN AVL_START_DATE AND AVL_END_DATE) )T3 ON T1.CUST_ID = T3.CUST_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT USER_ID, CUST_ID FROM SSYS250T WHERE USER_ID = #{slsEmpId} )T4 ON T1.CUST_ID = T4.CUST_ID WHERE USER_ID = #{slsEmpId} ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT DISTINCT T1.PROD_SEQ AS SEQ, T1.PROD_TYPE_CD, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('PROD_TYPE_CD',T1.PROD_TYPE_CD) AS PROD_TYPE_CD_NM, T1.PROD_DST_CD, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('PROD_DST_CD',T1.PROD_DST_CD) AS PROD_DST_CD_NM, IBIZ_CUST_NM(SPLY_CMPY_CUST_ID) AS SPLY_CMPY_NM, PRODP_NM, CASE WHEN T1.PROD_TYPE_CD = 'TS' THEN IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('SVC_UPC_CRIT_CD',T1.SVC_UPC_CRIT_CD) ELSE PROD_NM END AS PROD_NM, CASE WHEN T1.PROD_TYPE_CD = 'TS' THEN PROD_NM ELSE SVC_JOB_NM END AS SVC_JOB_NM, CASE WHEN INSTR(T1.UPC_UNIT_NM, 'User') = 0 THEN (CASE WHEN INSTR(T1.UPC_UNIT_NM, 'TB') = 0 THEN (CASE WHEN T1.UNIT_QNT = 1 OR T1.UNIT_QNT IS NULL THEN UPC_UNIT_NM ELSE T1.UNIT_QNT ||' '|| T1.UPC_UNIT_NM END) ELSE T1.UNIT_QNT || ' TB' END) ELSE T1.UNIT_QNT || ' User' END AS UPC_UNIT_NM, COPY_QNT AS QNT, BSC_UPC_AMT, LPC_AMT, SPLY_UPC_AMT, SPLY_AMT, CASE WHEN T1.PROD_TYPE_CD = 'LD' OR T1.PROD_TYPE_CD = 'SS' THEN CONCAT(T2.PRC_DC_OPTN_CD, ESTI_RMRK_CONT) ELSE ESTI_RMRK_CONT END AS RMRK_CONT FROM BEST010T T1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT PROD_SEQ, PROD_TYPE_CD, LISTAGG(IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('PRC_DC_OPTN_CD',PRC_DC_OPTN_CD), ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY PROD_SEQ) AS PRC_DC_OPTN_CD FROM BEST011T T2 WHERE FCST_PAL_ID = #{fcstPalId} GROUP BY PROD_SEQ, PROD_TYPE_CD) T2 ON T1.PROD_SEQ = T2.PROD_SEQ AND T1.PROD_TYPE_CD = T2.PROD_TYPE_CD WHERE T1.FCST_PAL_ID = #{fcstPalId} AND PROD_NM IS NOT NULL ORDER BY T1.PROD_SEQ

SELECT FCST_PAL_ID, PROD_SEQ AS SEQ, IBIZ_PRJT_NM(MA_TGT_PRJT_ID) AS PRJT_NM, PRODP_NM, MA_GODS_SPLY_AMT AS GODS_SPLY_AMT, MA_TRF, MA_START_DATE, MA_END_DATE, SPLY_UPC_AMT AS MNTH_MNDN_AMT, SPLY_AMT FROM BEST010T WHERE FCST_PAL_ID = #{fcstPalId} AND MA_TGT_PRJT_ID IS NOT NULL

SELECT FCST_PAL_ID, SEQ, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('TECH_SVC_CD',TECH_SVC_CD) AS SVC_JOB_NM, SVC_PRVD_CDNT_CONT, YRLY_FCST_PUT_COST_AMT, RMRK_CONT AS PRVD_SVC_RMRK_CONT FROM BEST080T WHERE FCST_PAL_ID = #{fcstPalId} ORDER BY SEQ
SELECT ESTI_ID, SEQ, PRJT_NM, PRODP_NM, GODS_SPLY_AMT, MA_TRF, MA_START_DATE, MA_END_DATE, MNTH_MNDN_AMT, SPLY_AMT FROM BEST170T WHERE ESTI_ID = #{estiId} ORDER BY SEQ
SELECT ESTI_ID, SEQ, SVC_JOB_NM, SVC_PRVD_CDNT_CONT, PRVD_SVC_RMRK_CONT FROM BEST180T WHERE ESTI_ID = #{estiId} ORDER BY SEQ
SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(ESTI_ID) IS NOT NULL THEN MAX(ESTI_ID) ELSE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy') || '000000' END AS ESTI_ID FROM BEST100T

SELECT CASE WHEN ( SELECT MAX(T1.DOC_NO) FROM BEST100T T1 INNER JOIN BEST000T T2 ON T2.PRJT_TYPE_CD = #{prjtTypeCd} AND T2.FCST_PAL_ID = T1.FCST_PAL_ID WHERE SUBSTR(T1.DOC_NO,8,8) IN #{estiWrtDate} )IS NULL THEN 'IZ-' || ( SELECT COM_CD FROM ACOM010T WHERE COM_GRP_CD = ( SELECT COM_GRP_CD FROM ACOM020T WHERE CLMN_NM = 'DOC_KIND_CD') AND COM_CD_CHAR_VAL = #{santFrmtCd} ) || '-' || #{estiWrtDate} || '-' || '00' ELSE ( SELECT MAX(T1.DOC_NO) FROM BEST100T T1 INNER JOIN BEST000T T2 ON T2.PRJT_TYPE_CD = #{prjtTypeCd} AND T2.FCST_PAL_ID = T1.FCST_PAL_ID WHERE SUBSTR(T1.DOC_NO,8,8) = #{estiWrtDate} ) END AS DOC_NO FROM DUAL
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO BEST100T ( ESTI_ID, FCST_PAL_ID, ESTI_WRT_DATE, DOC_NO, RCV_CMPY_NM,
RCV_CHRR_NM,
TRSMT_CHRR_NM,
TRSMT_TEL_NO,
TRSMT_EML_ADRS,
BSNS_NM, SPLY_CMPY_NM, SPLY_CMPY_BSNN_NO, SPLY_CMPY_RPRN_NM, SPLY_CMPY_ADRS, SPLY_CMPY_TEL_NO, SPLY_CMPY_FAX_NO, VAT_CVRD_DST_CD,
QLTY_GARNT_SVC_CONT,
ETC_MTR,
ESTIS_STAT_CD, REG_EMP_ID, REG_DT, CHG_EMP_ID, CHG_DT ) ( SELECT #{estiId} AS ESTI_ID ,T000.FCST_PAL_ID , #{estiWrtDate} AS ESTI_WRT_DATE
, #{docNo} AS DOC_NO
,( SELECT CUST_NM FROM CMST000T WHERE CUST_ID = T000.ORDE_CUST_ID ) AS RCV_CMPY_NM
, #{rcvChrrNm} AS RCV_CHRR_NM
, #{trsmtChrrNm} AS TRSMT_CHRR_NM
, #{trsmtTelNo} AS TRSMT_TEL_NO
, #{trsmtEmlAdrs} AS TRSMT_EML_ADRS
, #{bsnsNm} AS BSNS_NM
, #{splyCmpyNm} AS SPLY_CMPY_NM , #{splyCmpyBsnnNo} AS SPLY_CMPY_BSNN_NO , #{splyCmpyRprnNm} AS SPLY_CMPY_RPRN_NM , #{splyCmpyAdrs} AS SPLY_CMPY_ADRS , #{splyCmpyTelNo} AS SPLY_CMPY_TEL_NO , #{splyCmpyFaxNo} AS SPLY_CMPY_FAX_NO , #{vatCvrdDstCd} AS VAT_CVRD_DST_CD
, #{qltyGarntSvcCont} AS QLTY_GARNT_SVC_CONT
, #{etcMtr} AS ETC_MTR
, #{estisStatCd} AS ESTIS_STAT_CD , #{regEmpId} AS REG_EMP_ID , SYSDATE AS REG_DT , #{chgEmpId} AS CHG_EMP_ID , SYSDATE AS CHG_DT FROM BEST000T T000 JOIN ( SELECT CUST_ID, EMP_ID FROM CMST010T WHERE CUST_ROLE_CLSF_CD = 'C' ) CMT010 ON T000.SLS_EMP_ID = CMT010.EMP_ID WHERE T000.FCST_PAL_ID = #{fcstPalId} )

INSERT INTO BEST170T ( ESTI_ID, SEQ, PRJT_NM, PRODP_NM, GODS_SPLY_AMT, MA_TRF, MA_START_DATE, MA_END_DATE, MNTH_MNDN_AMT, SPLY_AMT ) ( SELECT #{estiId} AS ESTI_ID, PROD_SEQ AS SEQ, IBIZ_PRJT_NM(MA_TGT_PRJT_ID) AS PRJT_NM, PRODP_NM, NVL(MA_GODS_SPLY_AMT,0) AS GODS_SPLY_AMT, MA_TRF, MA_START_DATE, MA_END_DATE, NVL(SPLY_UPC_AMT,0) AS MNTH_MNDN_AMT, NVL(SPLY_AMT,0) AS SPLY_AMT FROM BEST010T WHERE FCST_PAL_ID = #{fcstPalId} AND MA_TGT_PRJT_ID IS NOT NULL )
mapper.update: UPDATE BEST100T SET ESTIS_STAT_CD = #{estisStatCd}, CHG_EMP_ID = #{chgEmpId}, ISU_DT = SYSDATE, CHG_DT = SYSDATE WHERE ESTI_ID = #{estiId}

UPDATE BEST100T SET ESTI_WRT_DATE = #{estiWrtDate}, DOC_NO = #{docNo}, RCV_CHRR_NM = #{rcvChrrNm}, TRSMT_CHRR_NM = #{trsmtChrrNm}, TRSMT_TEL_NO = #{trsmtTelNo}, TRSMT_EML_ADRS = #{trsmtEmlAdrs}, BSNS_NM = #{bsnsNm}, VAT_CVRD_DST_CD = #{vatCvrdDstCd}, QLTY_GARNT_SVC_CONT = #{qltyGarntSvcCont}, ETC_MTR = #{etcMtr}, CHG_EMP_ID = #{chgEmpId}, CHG_DT = SYSDATE WHERE ESTI_ID = #{estiId}
